favourite.article: Just praise the Lord for His life in you!!!
Thank You so much Lord Almighty!!!!!!! I am indeed a child of God!!

Just call O LORD!!! He'll change your life! O LORD JESUS!!
Lord Jesus thank You for changing my life!
I learned this hymn years ago and I still enjoy singing it with my children. Praise the Lord!!
I really enjoy singing this hymn, even though it's so simple. I always thought it was just for the gospel, but now I see that the content of this hymn can be my daily salvation.
Just taste and see that the Lord is good! Amen, He's good for you as He is for me! So whatever you do, just TASTE and SEE =]

I love the song O taste and see. I discovered when looking for something for our youth day and our theme is O taste and see that the Lord is good. Now I am going to present this to my church. Thank you and God bless.
